name: Madison Snow Mob
tagline: Make epic shit - in the snow
body:
# Welcome to the Madison Snow Mob

We're going to organize during the few times each winter when we have epic snow days to make fun & big snow sculptures.  It's a community thing.

## Join by sending a text to 608-729-7890.  That's all you have to do.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
